resources.string: Help!! I\'m in DANGER \n My current location is http://maps.google.com/?q=19.0410042,73.0168106

Please follow the below steps properly:


	1:Register Your Phone Number.
	2:Register Your Guardian Numbers.
	3:Always maintain working internet 
	 connection.
	4:SHAKE your phone vertically 3 times 
	 to ask for "HELP" in case of emergency 
	 to alert your guardians.

Features of the app- 


1.SOS/Emergency - Send a SMS containing- "I am In Danger" to selected 3 contacts and your GPS location to track you with 3 vertical phone swings or just a click of a button. 
 2.Alarm - An alarm (Police Siren) is set up within 5 seconds. It may help to scare the pursuer. 
 3.Fake Call- How often, do we think that if we had an incoming call right now, it can save us from the situation we are in right now. 
 4.Camera - Email the latest Media clicked by your Camera in every 10 minutes to your emergency contacts and save it on your secondary Storage.

An Android App for everyone irrespective of any gender discrimination (but especially developed for Women Saftey), which will send SOS/Emergancy message to registered Emergency numbers, based on a specific 3-5 vertical swings. The SOS will be comprised of user\'s current GPS coordinates,personal information and latest media in your storage to those numbers.
Make Sure that "Google" ,"WhatApp","Gmail" App is Installed on your phone and you give this App proper Access Permission like Call, SMS, Microphone, Camera, GPS.
